author: Sam Reynolds, AI Boost
title: Asia Morning Briefing: Analysts Say BTC’s Long-Term Focus Is Easing War Jitters
description: PLUS: Tim Draper sees parallels between the flight to BTC and Microsoft's early days.
content: Welcome to Asia Morning Briefing, a daily summary of top stories during U.S. hours and an overview of market moves and analysis. For a detailed overview of U.S. markets, see CoinDesk's Crypto Daybook… [+5798 chars]
